text:
@realDonaldTrump Who watches this drunk?

Yet another kremlin asset!

Reports fake news calling covid19 pandemic a hoax?

125k dead americans #1 in the world! And in the meantime trumps wants to thru out affordable health care Act leave us uninsured, sick and dead?

#TRE45ON https://t.co/NYmEbCIJU0
